node.display_long_description:
"SPIDER-MAN WITH GUNS — this is what VR was made for!"

SWARM is a fast-paced, arcade-style grapple shooter, with quick sessions, bright colorful worlds and globally competitive leaderboards that will take you back to the glory days of Arcade Games.

Armed with just a grappling hook and your handy pistols, you’ll be plunged into a flow state as you grapple, shoot and battle your way to the heart of the SWARM before it’s too late. Twitch reactions won’t be enough to carry you through, you’ll need to think strategically and plan your next move to stay alive.

Intense. Demanding. Exhilarating.

Did we mention hard?

---------------------
CROSS-BUY - Buy for Rift or Quest and get the other free

"Swarm could very well represent a turning point in the VR arcade genre" - VR Scout

"Swarm’s gameplay is as bold as its visuals, and...is instantly addictive" - VR Focus

"Hours of fun that makes the game hard to put down" - Gaming Trend

nodes.title: SWARM v1.0.3 is available now!
nodes.body_text:
We’re happy to announce that SWARM is now available in French, German, Japanese, Korean, and Latin American Spanish.

For our Desktop/Oculus Link users, this patch also includes support for graphics settings and a desktop spectator cam. Perfect for recording & streaming high quality video.

Thank you for playing!

Note: 📢 indicates a change inspired by community feedback!

Localization
- The game is now available in French, German, Japanese, Korean, and Latin American Spanish.
- This is Gameplay and UI Text only, no audio. Subtitles can be enabled in Settings > Audio.
- Language selector is available in Settings > Language.

Desktop Graphics Settings (Desktop/Oculus Link ONLY)
- 📢 Added desktop graphics settings (see Settings > Graphics)
- Disable LODs
- Increase particle counts
- More coming!
- Desktop spectator cam. This is a high resolution desktop camera with motion smoothing. Enable in Settings > Graphics.

Usability
📢 Added setting to disable the HUD. You can find it in Settings > Gameplay.
📢 Improved 180 degree thumbstick turning. Previously it was too sensitive and it was easy to accidentally trigger a 180 turn.


Don't forget to join our Discord to get the latest news and a chance to participate in future betas: https://discord.gg/kdfaVQD


-------------------


German
SWARM V1.0.3 ist jetzt verfügbar!
Wir freuen uns, euch mitteilen zu können, dass SWARM jetzt auf Französisch, Deutsch, Japanisch, Koreanisch und lateinamerikanischem Spanisch verfügbar ist.

Für unsere Desktop/Oculus Link-Benutzer birgt dieser Patch auch Unterstützung für Grafikeinstellungen und eine Desktop-Zuschauerkamera. Perfekt zum Aufnehmen & Streamen von Videos in hoher Qualität.

Danke fürs Spielen!

Hinweis: 📢 weist auf eine durch Community-Feedback inspirierte Änderung hin!

Übersetzung
- Das Spiel ist jetzt auf Französisch, Deutsch, Japanisch, Koreanisch und lateinamerikanischem Spanisch verfügbar.
- Dies betrifft nur den Spiel- und UI-Text, nicht den Ton. Untertitel können in Einstellungen > Audio aktiviert werden.
- Die Sprachauswahl ist unter Einstellungen > Sprache verfügbar.

Desktop-Grafikeinstellungen (NUR Desktop/Oculus Link)
- 📢 Desktop-Grafikeinstellungen sind hinzugefügt worden (siehe Einstellungen > Grafik)
- Detailreichtum deaktivieren
- Partikelanzahl erhöhen
- Weiteres folgt!
- Desktop-Zuschauerkamera. Dies ist eine hochauflösende Desktop-Kamera mit Bewegungsabmilderung. Aktivieren über Einstellungen > Grafik.

Benutzerfreundlichkeit
- 📢 Einstellung zur Deaktivierung der Blickfeldanzeige hinzugefügt. Ihr findet sie unter Einstellungen > Spielerlebnis.
- 📢 Verbessertes 180-Grad-Drehen des Daumen-Sticks. Zuvor war er zu empfindlich und man konnte sehr leicht aus Versehen eine 180er Drehung auslösen.


Vergiss nicht, unserem Discord beizutreten, um die neuesten Nachrichten zu erhalten und an zukünftigen Betas teilzunehmen: https://discord.gg/kdfaVQD


Korean
SWARM v1.0.3이 출시되었습니다!
이제 SWARM을 프랑스어, 독일어, 일본어, 한국어 및 중남미 스페인어로 플레이할 수 있다는 기쁜 소식을 전해드립니다!

데스크톱/Oculus Link 유저 여러분은 그래픽 설정과 데스크톱 관전 카메라 또한 이용하실 수 있습니다. 고화질로 녹화 및 스트리밍을 하는 데 큰 도움이 될 것입니다.

게임을 플레이해 주셔서 감사합니다!!

참고: 📢 커뮤니티 피드백을 참고한 변동 사항을 확인하세요!

현지화
- 이제 게임을 프랑스어, 독일어, 일본어, 한국어 및 중남미 스페인어로 플레이하실 수 있습니다.
- 번역은 게임플레이와 UI 텍스트에 적용되었으며 더빙은 이루어지지 않았습니다. 설정 > 오디오에서 자막을 활성화할 수 있습니다.
- 언어는 설정 > 언어에서 변경할 수 있습니다.

데스크톱 그래픽 설정 (데스크톱/Oculus Link 한정)
- 📢 데스크톱 그래픽 설정 추가 (설정 > 그래픽)
- 디테일 레벨 비활성화
- 입자 수 증가
- 이외에 더 많은 설정이 추가될 예정입니다!
- 데스크톱 관전 카메라를 이용하세요. 부드러운 모션이 적용된 고화질 데스크톱 카메라입니다. 설정 > 그래픽에서 활성화할 수 있습니다.

편리성 개선
- 📢 HUD를 비활성화할 수 있는 설정이 추가되었습니다. 설정 > 게임플레이에서 확인하세요.
- 📢 아날로그 스틱의 180도 회전이 개선되었습니다. 회전의 감도가 너무 민감하여 의도치 않은 180도 회전이 빈번하게 일어나던 점이 개선되었습니다.


최신 소식을 확인하고, 향후 베타에 참여할 기회를 얻고 싶으시다면 저희 디스코드(https://discord.gg/kdfaVQD)에 참여해 주세요.


French
SWARM v1.0.3 est disponible dès maintenant !
Nous sommes heureux de vous annoncer que SWARM est désormais disponible en français, allemand, japonais, coréen et espagnol d’Amérique latine.
Pour nos utilisateurs Bureau/Oculus Link, ce patch contient également un support pour les paramètres graphiques et une caméra de spectateur de bureau. Parfait pour enregistrer et diffuser des vidéos de haute qualité.

Merci de jouer !

Remarque : 📢 indique un changement inspiré par les commentaires de la communauté !

Localisation
- Le jeu est désormais disponible en français, allemand, japonais, coréen et espagnol d’Amérique latine.
- Il s’agit uniquement du texte de l’interface utilisateur et du jeu, et non pas de l’audio. Les sous-titres peuvent être activés dans Paramètres > Audio.
- Le sélecteur de langue est disponible dans Paramètres > Langue.

Paramètres graphiques de bureau (Bureau/Oculus Link UNIQUEMENT)
- 📢 Ajout des paramètres graphiques de bureau (voir Paramètres > Graphiques)
- Désactiver les LODs (niveaux de détail)
- Augmenter le décompte de particules
- Beaucoup plus à venir !
- Caméra de spectateur de bureau. Il s’agit d’une caméra de bureau de haute résolution avec interpolation de mouvement. Activez-la dans Paramètres > Graphiques.

Maniabilité
- 📢 Ajout d’un réglage pour désactiver l’ATH. Vous pouvez le trouver dans Paramètres > Jouabilité.
- 📢 Tour du stick analogique à 180 degrés amélioré. Précédemment, il était trop sensible et il était facile de déclencher accidentellement un tour à 180 degrés.


N’oubliez pas de rejoindre notre Discord pour obtenir les dernières informations et une chance de participer aux futures bêtas : https://discord.gg/kdfaVQD


Japanese
SWARM v1.0.3をリリース！
SWARMがフランス語・ドイツ語・日本語・韓国語・スペイン語（ラテンアメリカ）に対応しました。

今回のパッチには、デスクトップ／Oculus Linkユーザー向けのグラフィック設定とデスクトップ・スペクテイターカメラも含まれています。高画質動画の録画やストリーミングに最適です。

いつもプレイしていただき、ありがとうございます！

メモ： 📢はコミュニティフィードバックを参考にして変更されたものです！

ローカライゼーション
- フランス語・ドイツ語・日本語・韓国語・スペイン語（ラテンアメリカ）に対応しました。
- ゲームプレイやUIテキストの対応のみで、音声ではありません。字幕は［設定］>［音声］でオンにできます。
- 言語の選択は［設定］>［言語］にあります。

デスクトップグラフィック設定（デスクトップ／Oculus Linkのみ
- 📢 デスクトップグラフィック設定を追加（［設定］>［グラフィックス］を参照）
- LODのオフ
- パーティクルカウントの増加
- 他にもまだあります！
- デスクトップ・スペクテイターカメラ。これはモーションスムージング機能付きの高解像度デスクトップカメラです。［設定］>［グラフィックス］でオンにできます。

ユーザビリティ
- 📢 HUDをオフにできる設定を追加。［設定］>［ゲームプレイ］にあります。
- 📢 180度サムスティックターンを改善。これまでは感度が高すぎて、誤って180度ターンしやすい状態になっていました。


公式Discordに登録して、最新情報やベータ参加情報をチェックしましょう： https://discord.gg/kdfaVQD


Spanish
¡SWARM v1.0.3 ya está disponible!
Nos complace anunciar que SWARM ya está disponible en francés, alemán, japonés, coreano y español latinoamericano.

Para nuestros usuarios de escritorio/Oculus Link, este parche también incluye soporte para ajustes de gráficos y una cámara de espectador de escritorio. Perfecto para grabar y transmitir videos de alta calidad.

¡Gracias por jugar!

Nota: 📢 indica un cambio inspirado en los comentarios de la comunidad.

Localización
- El juego ahora está disponible en francés, alemán, japonés, coreano y español latinoamericano.
- Esto es solo texto de interfaz de usuario y juego, sin audio. Los subtítulos se pueden habilitar en Ajustes> Audio.
- El selector de idioma está disponible en Ajustes> Idioma.

Ajustes de gráficos de escritorio (escritorio/Oculus Link EXCLUSIVAMENTE)
- 📢 Se agregaron ajustes de gráficos de escritorio (ver Ajustes> Gráficos)
- Deshabilitar LODs
- Aumentar el recuento de partículas
- ¡Mucho más por venir!
- Cámara de espectador de escritorio. Esta es una cámara de escritorio de alta resolución con suavizado de movimiento. Habilítalo en Ajustes> Gráficos.

Usabilidad
- 📢 Ajuste agregado para deshabilitar el HUD. Puedes encontrarlo en Ajustes> Jugabilidad.
- 📢 Giro de la palanca de mando de 180 grados mejorado. Anteriormente era demasiado sensible y era fácil activar por accidente un giro de 180 grados.


No olvides unirte a nuestro Discord para recibir las últimas noticias y la oportunidad de participar en futuras betas: https://discord.gg/kdfaVQD

nodes.title: Game Patch: v1.0.2 has arrived!
nodes.body_text:
We are humbled by and grateful for the incredible response to our launch! This first patch contains some quality of life improvements, balancing, Phobia Mode, and fixes to various issues. Thank you for your support, and for playing SWARM!

Don't forget to join our Discord to get the latest news and a chance to participate in future betas: https://discord.gg/kdfaVQD

Note: 📢 indicates a change inspired by community feedback!

Balancing
- 📢 Patched Basilisk (2-5) exploit that made it possible to beat the boss in 5 seconds. Discovered by Sage, one of our longtime playtesters. In his honor there's a new "Sage Speedrunner" achievement for beating every boss in under 3 minutes! The 2-5 leaderboard has been reset, so have at it!
- 📢 Reduced difficulty of 5-2

Features
- 📢 Added Phobia Mode - this new setting disables sharks in Zone 1 and cloud falling in Zone 3. Access via Settings > Gameplay
- 📢 Added "Around Me" filter to leaderboard. From now on you can use the "Global" filter to see the top of the leaderboard, and "Around Me" to see a leaderboard centered on your high score.
- 📢 In boss levels, show time passed and potential score on the drone scoreboard
- Tweaked grapple aim so it feels more accurate. Aiming should also be easier when you're not looking at the target.

Graphics
- Reduce aliasing in Zone 4 EQ screens and various other places
- Fix some rendering issues in codex unlocks

Bug Fixes
- 📢 Fix audio spike when loading or retrying a level
- 📢 Fix bug where missiles sometimes don't despawn at the end of a game
- Fix various issues with boss death animation and sound
- Fix bug where tutorial UI can appear incorrect after resetting progress
- Fix bug where Scattershot boss (1-5) does two shield phases in a row
- Minor bug fixes and tweaks to the final boss

node.reviewDescription:
I've been having a blast with most VR games, but Swarm is on a whole new level. It's so simple, yet absolutely wonderful.

The floor is essentially lava, and you gotta grapple these floating platforms to keep your little pigs from touching the ground. 

The grappling hook gives real spiderman vibes, but it's more consistent with doing the monkey. Moving your controllers up and down while having a platform grappled will help propel you.

This is an arena horde game in a sense. Very few games still put me into another world like Swarm does. The graphics are pretty solid and there's enough enemy types to keep you guessing what's coming in the next wave.

Aaahhh the but... There's always a but.

There's a few weapons you can obtain as power-ups. When I say a few, we're talking a handful. I do admire most of the weapons in this game, but while beneficial I wanted more of a selection. Swarm kills it with the futuristic vibe, but there's a lack of power weapon diversity.

That's really the only downer on this title.

The shooting in Swarm is crisp like the edges of a thin pancake. Zipping around the map and flailing your arms around is half the fun! I almost lose balance everytime I play from the fast pace slaying.

This is my favorite Oculus game and I recommend it to everyone.

Don't think. 

Just buy all ready!

website_page_meta.description:
"SPIDER-MAN WITH GUNS — this is what VR was made for!"

SWARM is a fast-paced, arcade-style grapple shooter, with quick sessions, bright colorful worlds and globally competitive leaderboards that will take you back to the glory days of Arcade Games.
